regen.absent_element: sending a VMEbus reset on failed re-sync
regen.new_specification: System Initialization shall send a VMEbus reset if an attempted re-sync fails.

regen.absent_element: situation of handling failed re-sync by sending VMEbus reset
regen.new_specification: If a re-sync of any of the FCP processors fails, the system shall send a VMEbus reset to handle the failure.

regen.absent_element: handling failed re-sync by sending a VMEbus reset
regen.new_specification: If the re-synchronization of any FCP processor fails, System Initialization shall send a VMEbus reset to handle the failure.

label: If the failed FCP processor has not synced, it shall send a single voted VMEbus reset through the NE to the failed FCP
absence: action of sending a VMEbus reset
